Question: Question

Message.VIM_NOT_EXECUTED:
'VIM' is not executed.
VIM software must be installed on this system to run it.
Message.ANY_KEY_RETURN_M_JS: Press any key to return m.js
Message.REMOVE_SELECTED_FILES: Do you want to remove the selected file(s)?
Message.SAME_SOURCE_AND_TARGET: source and target directory are the same.
Message.{{filename}}_FILE_NOT_EXISTS: '{{filename}}' file NOT exists. What would you do want?

Help.Mcd: showing directory structure on this window.
Help.Terminal: run to XTerm(shell command) on this window.
Help.CommandBox: open the shell command on bottom line.
Help.CommandBoxClose: closes the shell command on bottom line.
Help.ConsoleView: shows the console for a moment.
Help.Remove: remove selected file(s) or current file.
Help.Cut: cut to clipboard from the selected file(s) or current file.
Help.Copy: copy to clipboard from the selected file(s) or current file.
Help.Paste: paste to this directory from the clipboard.
Help.Rename: change the name of a file or directory

About: It's a feature rich full-screen text mode application that allows
you to copy, move and delete files and whole directory trees,
search for files and run commands in the sub-shell.
For bug reports, comments and questions, please visit the homepage.
